title: The Mist
description: "The Mist" is a spy novel, much in the lines of Jason Bourne, dealing with todayâ€™s conspiracies, mostly political, and regarding intelligence agencies. Tanya, a Pakistani black ops agent, also known as a "Knight" belongs to a secret intelligence agency "The Mist". Her job is to penetrate all groups that show signs of terrorist activities and to find out who runs them.
author: Nagwa Malik
